entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload with a specific code structure throws `System.BadImageFormatException: An attempt was made to load a program with an incorrect format.` #105594
  • Cannot use CryptoStream with read-only stream #105592
    Future
  • x64 `lea` assertion failure in threadstatic on freebsd-x64 #105588
  • [API Proposal]: InlineArray to Span conversion without Unsafe.As #105586
    10.0.0
  • dotNET 9 AOT: Unexpected Behavior with StackTraceSupport and UnmanagedCallersOnly #105582

Closed

  • Master tracking issue for removing BinaryFormatter usage from dotnet libs #39287
    9.0.0
  • `initblk` Performance Degradation in `.NET 5+` compared to `.NET Framework` #93825
  • CA1820 is not being triggered when the "is" operator is used for the comparison #100834
  • Segmentation fault in System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #98609
  • How to use Source Generator P/Invoke with Byte[] in struct properly? #105462
  • (U)Int128 should provide correct op_IntegerDisivion and op_Disivion #92461
  • [PERF] Regression in Math.Single and Char_IsLower Benchmarks on Ubuntu Arm64 #92162
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8JsonReader DateTimeOffset TimeZone Overloads #105583
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Numerics.Vectors, Version=4.1.3.0, or one of its dependencies. #96980
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.SearchValuesCharTests on 7/22/2024 3:17:40 PM #105488
  • AV in runtime when catching exception thrown in other ALC with new EH on win-arm64 #105483
  • baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester fails on Linux #46175
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Enhance the bound generator concept to remove duplicate parameters and make it more pervasive throughout the system #105597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Partial re-revert of #104336. Only JIT fixes are included. #105596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE GetFfr, SetFfr, LoadVectorFirstFaulting, GatherVectorFirstFaulting #105595
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Improve codegen around unsigned comparisons #105593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix ilc error message #105590
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Export required symbols for FreeBSD ELFs #105587
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Remove HelperMethodFrame from `GetMulticastInvoke` #105584
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • chore: fix some comments #105504
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Revert "JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting`" #105591
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use filesystem name mapping on FreeBSD #105417
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, community-contribution
  • Revert "Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars" #105562
    needs-area-label
  • Remove CONTEXT_XSTATE in FaultingExceptionFrame::UpdateRegDisplay #105569
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix shutdown with multiple unhandled HW exceptions #105578
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: Determine which ARM64 HWIntrinsics will throw ArgumentOufOfRangeExceptions #105527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a potential out-of-bound read in RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver #104536
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2503863 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fix paltest_pal_sxs_test1 on illumos #105207
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Add GetArrayData to Object contract, partially implement ISOSDacInterface::GetObjectData #105534
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Convert.FromHexString exception with too large buffer #105426
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Reset counters within Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Support listening to meters out-of-proc using a wildcard #105581
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: DelayfreeUses for FMLA should take into account CndSel for RMW #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the performance of `BigInteger`.`{Max|Min}Magnitude`/`Abs` #105570
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Refactor memory copies in `SafeBuffer` #105206
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add ZLib, Brotli compression options #105430
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add a missing = in BigInteger.cs #105456
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Rename corefx -> runtime libraries #105285
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    NO-MERGE, blocked, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update Preview/Experimental Attributes in Intrinsics #105579
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Automatically register and improve CLI completions for the dotnet CLI #42397
  • Cannot control verbosity with `dotnet tool restore --verbosity` #27153
    8.0.4xx
  • [Question] Resolving runtime assemblies for .NET Core application #2434
    Discussion
  • With .NET 8 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: Workload version 8.0.400-baseline.24372.6 was not found.." displayed when installing Maui workload in CLI. #42357

PullRequests

Merged

  • Misc updates to the WriteSbrpUsageReport task #42405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enabled NativeAOT for Arm in SourceBuild/content/repo-projects/sdk.proj #42351
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Strange Exceptions During Binding #74574

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Move 'generate XXX' code fixers down to code-style layer. #74567
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom types with converters cause schema generation to fail #57041
  • Add ClientApplications to make it OAuth 2.0 compliant. #57040
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #57039
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #57038
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_spring #57036

Closed

  • TypeError: Failed to execute 'fetch' in Blazor Webassembly #57015
  • .NET 8 Blazor Web App Scoped Dependency Injection Behavior #57022
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, mvc, single_query #57027
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #57026

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add remarks to FromBodyAttrbiute #56997
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Resize hpack dynamic table down then back up #57034
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Allow SOS testing against a private runtime build #4818
  • Enable new exception handling in .NET 9 SOS testing #4817
    DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cross-OS native compilation is not supported. #23869
  • ObservableCollection<T>.Clear() throws System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #23868

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Add `Window.Activate()` #23873
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Shadow for clipped visual element #23872
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

Updated

  • [net9.0] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #23865
    area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-webview
  • Fixed a crash for the samples app [User interface concepts -> styles] #23852
    area-docs, area-xaml
  • [net9.0] Update preview7 packages #23809
    9.0-preview7
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
  • [WiP] When swapping out ShellItems clear services #23863
  • [Windows] Handle non-seekable streams in `PlatformImage.FromStream` (take 2) #23824
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Update net8.0 to Sonoma and iOS #23655
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Delete_FromSql_converted_to_subquery not discovered by xunit #34301

PullRequests

Updated

  • Avoid duplicating complex expression in comparisons #34172
  • Translate Order & OrderDescending #34282
  • Use null propagation to optimize away `IS NOT NULL` checks #34127
  • Make sort order consistent in split queries #34097
  • Add extension point to Migrate #34199
